Subject: RE: PPM Access 


Hello Marielle,

 

Thank you for your clarification on the below.

 

Kindly be informed that all  the storage units in D3 are without insurance, therefore you have to apply separately with the service providers.

 

I’m looping in my colleague @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> , who might be able to share some contacts with the insurance providers.

 

Kindly let me know if you require additional information.

 

Thanks and Regards,

 

Gelynne

Do let me know if you know of other options that do.

 

Kind Regards,

 

MK

They also need some items moved in order to get to the area that needs PPM.

 

Is this something you can support with?

MK

Hi Marielle,
